title: Figures with Chinese Lanterns, I
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Edwin E. Hokin
provenance_text:
Gabrijel Stupica [1913-1990], Ljubljana, Yugoslavia; New London-Marlborough Gallery, London, England [1]; Mr. Edwin E. Hokin [1915-1990], Highland Park, IL, by December 1961 until February 15, 1962 [2]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1962 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 380, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by New London-Marlborough Gallery.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Mr. Hokin from the International (see copies of signed purchase agreement and other correspondence in curatorial file.) Apparently, before the painting was crated and shipped, it was given to Carnegie Institute as a gift of Mr. and Mrs. Edwin E. Hokin. It was accessioned on February 15, 1962.
